code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import reducerUser from'./user';import reducerOrder from'./order';import reducerOrderApproval from'./orderapproval';import reducerPurchasingOrder from'./purchasingorder';var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:reducerUser,order:reducerOrder,orderapproval:reducerOrderApproval,purchasingorder:reducerPurchasingOrder});export default rootReducer;
